languages.text: "До становления Астартес я мечтал стать скьяльдом, хранителем историй. На пирах я часто пою о подвигах своих братьев. Тысячи их в памяти моей. Когда я рядом, Волки бьются еще ретивее, ведь знают, что их деяния сохраню я в вечности. Один Механикус рек, что в наших песнях скрыты психомеметические коды, укрепляющие отвагу. Наверное, где-нибудь в других местах так и есть. Но на Фенрисе саги пекут лишь из памяти, почтения и гордости".

"Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."
languages.original_text: "До становления Астартес я мечтал стать скьяльдом, хранителем историй. На пирах я часто пою о подвигах своих братьев. Тысячи их в памяти моей. Когда я рядом, Волки бьются еще ретивее, ведь знают, что их деяния сохраню я в вечности. Один Механикус рек, что в наших песнях скрыты психомеметические коды, укрепляющие отвагу. Наверное, где-нибудь в других местах так и есть. Но на Фенрисе саги пекут лишь из памяти, почтения и гордости".

languages.text: “在成为阿斯塔特修士之前，我原本梦想成为一位吟游诗人，一位专门保存故事的记录者。参加宴会的时候，我经常会唱起兄弟们的功绩。我的脑海中保留着数以千计的故事，只要我在附近，狼群就会无比凶猛地作战，因为他们知道他们的事迹将会被人传唱。有个技术神甫说我们的歌声中包含着隐藏的心理测量代码，可以提高人们的勇气。或许别的地方确实有这样的代码，但在芬里斯，我们的史诗由记忆、尊重与荣耀编制而成。”
languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

traits.locale_text: “在成为阿斯塔特修士之前，我原本梦想成为一位吟游诗人，一位专门保存故事的记录者。参加宴会的时候，我经常会唱起兄弟们的功绩。我的脑海中保留着数以千计的故事，只要我在附近，狼群就会无比凶猛地作战，因为他们知道他们的事迹将会被人传唱。机械修会的人说我们的歌声中包含着隐藏的心理测量代码，可以提高人们的勇气。或许别的地方确实有这样的代码，但在芬里斯，我们的史诗由记忆、尊重与荣耀编制而成。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Antes de convertirme en Astartes, soñaba con llegar a ser un skjald, un relator de historias. En los festines suelo cantar las hazañas de mis hermanos. Tengo miles en la memoria. Cuando estoy cerca, los Lobos luchan con más ferocidad porque saben que su saga será inmortalizada. Oí a un tecnosacerdote que afirmaba que nuestros cánticos encerraban códigos psicométricos ocultos que aumentan el valor. Es posible que en otros lugares sea así, pero en Fenris las sagas son fruto del recuerdo, del respeto y del orgullo».
languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de convertirme en Astartes, soñaba con llegar a ser un skjald, un relator de historias. En los festines suelo cantar las hazañas de mis hermanos. Tengo miles en la memoria. Cuando estoy cerca, los Lobos luchan con más ferocidad porque saben que su saga será inmortalizada. Oí a alguien del Mechanicus que afirmaba que nuestros cánticos encerraban códigos psicométricos ocultos que aumentan el valor. Es posible que en otros lugares sea así, pero en Fenris las sagas son fruto del recuerdo, del respeto y del orgullo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「アスタルテスになる前は、物語の番人こと「スキャルド」になることを夢見ていた。宴会ではよく兄弟の活躍を歌った。俺の記憶には何千もの物語が刻まれている。俺が近くにいると、狼はさらに獰猛に戦う。自分の行いが不滅になると知っているからだ。技術司祭の一人は、俺達の歌には勇気を高めるサイコメトリー・コードが隠されていると主張した。他の土地にはそういうものがあるのかもしれない。だがフェンリスでは、俺達のサーガは記憶から、敬意から、誇りから紡がれているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

traits.locale_text: 「アスタルテスになる前は、物語の番人こと「スキャルド」になることを夢見ていた。宴会ではよく兄弟の活躍を歌った。俺の記憶には何千もの物語が刻まれている。俺が近くにいると、狼はさらに獰猛に戦う。自分の行いが不滅になると知っているからだ。技術司祭の一人は、俺達の歌には勇気を高めるサイコメトリー・コードが隠されていると主張した。他の土地にはそういうものがあるのかもしれない。だがフェンリスでは、俺達のサーガは記憶から、敬意から、誇りから紡がれているのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bevor ich zum Astartes geworden bin, war es mein Traum, ein Skalde zu werden, ein Hüter der Geschichten. Auf Festen singe ich oft von den Taten meiner Brüder. Tausende sind in meinem Gedächtnis gespeichert. Wenn ich in der Nähe bin, kämpfen die Wolves noch entschlossener, denn sie wissen, ihre Taten werden unsterblich. Einer der Techpriester hatte die Theorie, dass unsere Lieder verborgene psychometrische Codes enthalten, die den Mut fördern sollen. Vielleicht gibt es so etwas anderswo auch. Aber auf Fenris werden unsere Sagen aus Erinnerungen gesponnen, aus Respekt, aus Stolz."
languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich zum Astartes geworden bin, war es mein Traum, ein Skalde zu werden, ein Hüter der Geschichten. Auf Festen singe ich oft von den Taten meiner Brüder. Tausende sind in meinem Gedächtnis gespeichert. Wenn ich in der Nähe bin, kämpfen die Wolves noch entschlossener, denn sie wissen, ihre Taten werden unsterblich. Ein Mechanicus sagte, dass unsere Lieder verborgene psychometrische Codes enthalten, die den Mut fördern sollen. Vielleicht gibt es so etwas anderswo auch. Aber auf Fenris werden unsere Sagen aus Erinnerungen gesponnen, aus Respekt, aus Stolz."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Avant de rejoindre les Astartes, je rêvais de devenir skjald, un gardien des histoires. Lors des banquets, je chante souvent les exploits de mes frères. J'en garde des milliers en mémoire. Lorsque je suis là, les Space Wolves redoublent de férocité, car ils savent que leurs actes deviendront immortels. L'un des technoprêtres a affirmé que nos chansons contenaient des codes psychométriques cachés qui décuplaient le courage. De telles choses existent peut-être ailleurs. Mais sur Fenris, nos sagas sont issues de nos souvenirs, de notre respect, de notre fierté. »
languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

L'un des Mechanicus a affirmé que nos chansons contenaient des codes psychométriques cachés qui augmentaient le courage. De telles choses existent peut-être ailleurs. Mais sur Fenris, nos sagas sont issues de nos souvenirs, de notre respect, de notre fierté. »

languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

languages.text: "Astartes olmadan önce skjald, yani hikâyelerin muhafızı olmayı düşlerdim. Ziyafetlerde sık sık kardeşlerimin yiğitliklerini anlatırım. Zihnimde binlerce hikâye vardır. Ben yakınlardayken Kurtlar çok daha vahşice savaşır çünkü eylemlerinin hikâyelerimle ölümsüzleşeceğini bilirler. Tekno Rahiplerden biri, bizim hikâyelerimizin cesareti artıran gizli psikometrik kodlar içerdiğini öne sürmüştü. Belki başka yerlerde bu teori doğrudur. Fakat Fenris'te destanlarımız; hatıralardan, saygıdan ve gururdan doğar."
languages.original_text: "Before becoming an Astartes, I dreamed of becoming a skjald, a keeper of stories. At feasts I often sing of my brothers' exploits. Thousands are stored in my memory. When I am near, Wolves fight even more ferociously, for they know their deeds will be immortalised. One of the Tech-Priests theorised that our songs contained hidden psychometric codes to increase courage. Maybe there is such a thing in other places. But on Fenris our sagas are spun from memory, from respect, from pride."

traits.locale_text: "Astartes olmadan önce hikâyelerin muhafızı anlamına gelen skjald olmayı hayal ediyordum. Ziyafetlerde sık sık kardeşimin yiğitliklerini anlatırım. Zihnimde binlerce hikâye vardır. Ben yakınlardayken Kurtlar çok daha vahşi bir şekilde savaşır çünkü eylemlerinin benim hikâyelerimle ölümsüzleşeceğini bilirler. Tekno Rahiplerden biri, bizim hikâyelerimizin cesareti artıran gizli psikometrik kodlar içerdiğini öne sürmüştü. Belki başka yerlerde bu teori doğrudur. Fakat Fenris'te destanlarımız hatıralardan, saygıdan ve gururdan doğar."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
